tour.step_1: Welcome to the Demo Application for B2Broker! This app is designed to demonstrate Angular development skills for creating high-load frontend apps, showcasing a compelling UI vision, and illustrating the ability to build fully-functional frontend applications from scratch.
tour.step_2: This application receives large amounts of data with high frequency and displays last 10 items from data list in this table.
tour.step_3: Parameters of data producer logic can be adjusted using this UI panel.
tour.step_4: Set interval in milliseconds to adjust how frequently new data list shuld be generated by producer.
tour.step_5: Set how many items in data list should be generated in each iteration.
tour.step_6: In this field you can specify you custom data ids. As result, these ids will be used for first data items in table.
tour.step_7: This menu allows to change app language and start this into again. Happy testing!
